title: Social-Emotional Learning Competency Enhancement Program Using Robotics and Coding

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary digital competence and experience solving simple problems
context.additional_context: A course that develops social-emotional learning (SEL) competencies through robotics simulations and coding activities in a smartphone-based learning environment. Aims to enhance collaborative abilities and self-awareness through team-based problem-solving tasks

learning_goals: Learners can solve over 80% of assigned tasks through collaborative robot control coding with teammates
Learners achieve 20%+ score improvement in self-awareness and relationship management on SEL competency assessments
Learners implement at least three types of robot operation logic using mobile platform-based simulation tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
